title: The Whispering Stone
goal: Introduce Eldrin's awakening and the initial mystery of the changed world, establishing his disorientation and the first hint of the pervasive blight.
stakes_shift: Eldrin's ancient existence is revealed to Lyra, forcing a clash between his forgotten past and the harsh realities of the present world.

bridge.to_next: Eldrin grapples with his weakened state and the implications of the blight's pervasive spread.

sections.title: Awakening in Dust
sections.intent: Establish Eldrin's disorientation and the ancient, forgotten nature of his sanctuary.

scenes.summary: Eldrin stirs from a profound slumber within a crumbling, overgrown sanctuary, his senses overwhelmed by a world he no longer recognizes.
scenes.outcome: Eldrin is physically reawakened but mentally disoriented, burdened by fragmented memories.

sections.title: The First Glimpse
sections.intent: Reveal the subtle signs of the world's decay and Eldrin's initial struggle with his powers.

scenes.summary: Eldrin ventures from his sanctuary, confronting a landscape subtly twisted and unnerving, a stark contrast to his memories.
scenes.outcome: Eldrin perceives the world has changed drastically, with an underlying sense of unnatural decay.

sections.title: A Hunter's Vigil
sections.intent: Introduce Lyra, establishing her pragmatic nature and the initial tension with Eldrin.

scenes.summary: Lyra, a keen-eyed tracker, observes strange energy fluctuations near the ancient ruins, drawn by curiosity and a hunter's instinct.
scenes.outcome: Lyra is drawn to the ruins, sensing an unusual presence.

sections.title: Unforeseen Encounter
sections.intent: Bring Eldrin and Lyra into direct contact, highlighting their contrasting perspectives.

scenes.summary: Eldrin's attempt to sense the land's health leads him directly into Lyra's path, resulting in a tense, silent standoff.
scenes.outcome: Eldrin and Lyra meet, establishing initial suspicion and wary curiosity.
